video.title: Switched at Birth
video.synopsis: In this dramatic family series, two teenagers discover they were accidentally switched at birth, setting off a chain reaction of life-altering events.

episodes.synopsis: Bay & Daphne discover that when they were babies they were switched at birth.
episodes.title: This Is Not a Pipe

episodes.synopsis: The parents navigate their new living situation, Daphne hangs out with Liam and Regina opens up to Bay about her family's past.
episodes.title: American Gothic

episodes.synopsis: Bay begins to ask questions about her biological father, while Kathryn helps Regina find a job.
episodes.title: Portrait of My Father

episodes.synopsis: The Buckner Hall fundraiser causes tension between everyone.
episodes.title: Dance Amongst Daggers

episodes.synopsis: Bay's parents discover she is sneaking around with Ty and as punishment invite Ty over for an awkward family dinner.
episodes.title: Dogs Playing Poker

episodes.synopsis: Daphne has a hard time adjusting at Buckner, while Bay and Emmett bond while looking for information.
episodes.title: The Persistence of Memory

episodes.synopsis: Daphne discovers a secret Regina has been hiding, and Bay and Emmett continue to get closer.
episodes.title: The Stag Hunt

episodes.synopsis: Bay and Emmett's relationship gets more serious, and Regina comes clean about a secret she has been hiding from everyone.
episodes.title: Pandora's Box

episodes.synopsis: Regina tries to reconnect with her daughters during their birthdays.
episodes.title: Paradise Lost

episodes.synopsis: Bay's life is changed by someone who shows up to her art show, and Daphne reveals her feelings to Emmett.
episodes.title: The Homecoming

episodes.synopsis: Angelo pursues a relationship with Bay, giving Bay a glimpse of what life with her biological parents might have been like.
episodes.title: Starry Night

episodes.synopsis: Daphne considers quitting the Carlton basketball team in order to play for Buckner, while Bay tries to make a good impression on Melody.
episodes.title: The Tempest

episodes.synopsis: Daphne discovers the real reason Buckner wanted her to play for them, while Bay stands behind Emmett.
episodes.title: Self Portrait with Bandaged Ear

episodes.synopsis: Daphne and Bay rally together to support the same cause, while Kathryn and John hire a new lawyer.
episodes.title: Les Soeurs d'Estrées

episodes.synopsis: John and Kathryn agree to invite Angelo over for dinner, and Emmett moves into his dad's house.
episodes.title: Explusion from the Garden of Eden

episodes.synopsis: Kathryn's mom comes to town for a visit and bonds with Daphne, while Bay is chosen to paint a mural at Buckner.
episodes.title: Las Dos Fridas

episodes.synopsis: Regina introduces Bay to an art dealer, while Daphne participates in a contest to decide the starting lineup for the basketball team.
episodes.title: Protect Me From What I Want

episodes.synopsis: Emmett struggles with his speech therapy, while Daphne is named athlete of the month at Buckner.
episodes.title: The Art of Painting

episodes.synopsis: Daphne questions her relationship with Wilke, and Emmett is jealous when he finds out Bay is still emailing Ty.
episodes.title: Write a Lonely Soldier

episodes.synopsis: Bay gets stuck in the middle of Emmett's custody battle, while Daphne participates in a basketball game that has Carlton and Buckner facing off.
episodes.title: Game On

episodes.synopsis: Kathryn and Regina team up to try to find Angelo, while Bay and Daphne team up on a birthday present for Emmett.
episodes.title: The Sleep of Reason Produces Monsters

episodes.synopsis: In the winter finale, Bay discovers a secret that Emmett was hiding.
episodes.title: Venus, Cupid, Folly, and Time

episodes.synopsis: Bay returns from her trip and arrives with a new guy, while Daphne gets a new job.
episodes.title: This Is the Color of My Dreams

episodes.synopsis: Regina and Angelo meet with immigration but it doesn't go well, while Bay meets another artist.
episodes.title: The Intruder

episodes.synopsis: Bay meets some other street artists, while Regina, Melody and Kathryn all take a liking to Daphne's boss when they visit Daphne at the restaurant.
episodes.title: The Shock of Being Seen

episodes.synopsis: Emmett meets a new girl while at a motorcycle show that John hosts, and when Bay and her friends have a run in with the police they find out her real background.
episodes.title: Tree of Forgiveness

episodes.synopsis: Bay continues to hang out with the other artists, against her family's wishes, while Daphne decides to confront Chef Jeff about her feelings.
episodes.title: The Declaration of Independence

episodes.synopsis: Bay's family tries to distract her from hanging out with Zarra by inviting Alex to dinner, but Bay bails on the dinner when Zarra needs her help.
episodes.title: We Are the Kraken of Our Own Sinking Ships

episodes.synopsis: Bay struggles to get the money back to John's safe before he notices, and the trial against the hospital begins.
episodes.title: The Trial

episodes.synopsis: John and Kathryn try to get Bay to return home, but she and Zarra have other plans. Daphne is confronted about her relationship with Chef Jeff.
episodes.title: Street Noises Invade the House

episodes.synopsis: Angelo uses his new money to buy presents for the families, which include a food truck for Daphne. Bay is accused of cheating on her French test.
episodes.title: The Door to Freedom

episodes.synopsis: Bay convinces John and Kathryn to let her attend Carlton's pilot program for siblings of deaf students. Toby starts dating Nikki, but distances himself from her when Emmett shows him a scandalous photo of her online.
episodes.title: The Awakening Conscience

episodes.synopsis: Kathryn possibly hurts John's campaign during a radio interview, while Melody forces the students to go on a retreat to help bridge the divide between them.
episodes.title: Duel of Two Women

episodes.synopsis: Bay struggles to adapt to her changing relationship with Angelo, while Daphne sees a different side to Travis and considers taking their relationship to another level.
episodes.title: Dressing for the Charade

episodes.synopsis: Daphne feels awkward around Travis, while Kathryn offers to work at Carlton in an attempt to get closer to Bay.
episodes.title: The Acquired Inability to Escape

episodes.synopsis: Daphne continues to hide the truth from her parents, while Bay gets closer to Noah.
episodes.title: Human/Need/Desire

episodes.synopsis: Daphne makes a decision about Travis, while Bay and Noah's relationship blossoms.
episodes.title: Drive in the Knife

episodes.synopsis: Bay confronts Daphne with her suspicions about Regina, and Daphne gets cast in the school play.
episodes.title: Tight Rope Walker

episodes.synopsis: In this episode entirely done in ASL, the kids at Carlton plan a sit-in to convince the board to keep Carlton open and both Bay and Melody are caught in the middle.
episodes.title: Uprising

episodes.synopsis: Regina agrees to get help, John's senate race ends and Bay and Daphne are at odds over Noah.
episodes.title: Introducing the Miracle

episodes.synopsis: Daphne and Bay both get jobs and both move in with their biological parents.
episodes.title: Mother and Child Divided

episodes.synopsis: Ty and Bay reconnect, while Kathryn and Daphne join a tennis tournament.
episodes.title: Distorted House

episodes.synopsis: Bay is upset that Toby is giving up music and gets him a gig to reignite his love for music, and Bay and Daphne finally begin to make up.
episodes.title: The Good Samaritan

episodes.synopsis: Bay and Ty go on a double date with Mary Beth and Mac, while Emmett is at odds with his dad over the cochlear implant.
episodes.title: He Did What He Wanted

episodes.synopsis: In this alternate reality episode, Bay and Daphne grow up together under the care of John and Kathryn.
episodes.title: Ecce Mono

episodes.synopsis: Toby steps up at the car wash, while Regina asks Angelo if she can help design the wine bar.
episodes.title: The Physical Impossibility of Death in the Mind of Someone Living

episodes.synopsis: Bay is overwhelmed in her relationship, while Daphne and Jace work together, and Toby reconnects with Simone.
episodes.title: Prudence, Avarice, Lust, Justice, Anger

episodes.synopsis: Bay plans a screening of her film, and Daphne runs into an old friend.
episodes.title: As the Shadows Deepen

episodes.synopsis: Bay and Ty go on a camping trip, while Daphne stays home when she is concerned the truth might come out.
episodes.title: What Goes Up Must Come Down

episodes.synopsis: Toby gets some surprise news from an old friend, while Daphne and Bay agree to throw a bachelorette party.
episodes.title: The Merrymakers

episodes.synopsis: John and Kathryn try to help Daphne out, while Ty receives his deployment notice and is worried about breaking the news to Bay.
episodes.title: Departure of Summer

episodes.synopsis: Daphne and Bay start their senior year at Carlton. Kathryn signs up for tap dancing class.
episodes.title: Drowning Girl

episodes.synopsis: Both Daphne and Bay have to make things right in their lives. Kathryn invites Renzo over for dinner.
episodes.title: Your Body is a Battleground

episodes.synopsis: Bay helps her professor at an art show. Kathryn is anxious about Toby moving out. Regina finds a job opportunity with Wes, a real estate developer.
episodes.title: Fountain

episodes.synopsis: Daphne searches for a patient she lets leave without checking out. Bay tries to get Tank back in art class. Toby struggles to recruit players.
episodes.title: It Hurts to Wait With Love if Love is Somewhere Else

episodes.synopsis: Nikki's mom and John bond while helping Toby move. Bay rejoins the field hockey team to impress an art school recruiter. Kathryn pitches a new book.
episodes.title: Have You Really the Courage?

episodes.synopsis: The Kennishes throw a murder mystery party while Daphne throws a birthday party for Campbell. Bay learns why Tank didn't invite her to a frat party.
episodes.title: The Scream

episodes.synopsis: Kathryn and John's marriage is on the rocks. Daphne tries to help Sharee.
episodes.title: Memory is Your Image of Perfection

episodes.synopsis: Daphne considers a career as a doctor despite her deafness. Bay struggles to complete an art assignment with her injured hand.
episodes.title: Dance Me to the End of Love

episodes.synopsis: Daphne is invited to a fundraiser at the clinic. Bay and Tank's relationship suffers. Toby tutors Sharee.
episodes.title: The Past (Forgotten-Swallowed)

episodes.synopsis: Nikki unexpectedly returns from Peru. Bay and Tank arrange a prank against a rival field hockey team.
episodes.title: The Ambush

episodes.synopsis: Bay enlists Tank's help to prove that Emmett is being "catfished." Daphne rises above her fear to help someone from her past.
episodes.title: Love Seduces Innocence, Pleasure Entraps, and Remorse Follows

episodes.synopsis: Emmett is bullied, and Melody wants to take action. Bay struggles with her feelings for Emmett and Tank. Regina decides to get her job back.
episodes.title: Love Among Ruins

episodes.synopsis: Bay and Emmett stumble upon a surprising discovery. John accidentally reveals the truth about Bay and Emmett.
episodes.title: Like a Snowball Down a Mountain

episodes.synopsis: Bay worries her friendship with Emmett is doomed. Daphne tries for a Latina college scholarship at Regina's urging.
episodes.title: Oh, Future!

episodes.synopsis: Toby returns from Iceland. Angelo helps Daphne focus on the SATs by taking her mind off the test altogether.
episodes.title: And We Bring the Light

episodes.synopsis: After an accident, the Kennish-Vasquez family is crippled by grief and must make an impossible choice.
episodes.title: The Image Disappears

episodes.synopsis: John brings Daphne and Bay to Chicago to tour Northwestern. To help Regina, Kathryn entertains baby Abby and Leo.
episodes.title: Girl with the Death Mask (She Plays Alone)

episodes.synopsis: Daphne lashes out at Regina, and Bay tries to mend her friendship with Tank.
episodes.title: It Isn't What You Think

episodes.synopsis: Daphne organizes a Senior Ditch Day, which gets out of hand. Bay secretly grapples with her mortality.
episodes.title: You Will Not Escape

episodes.synopsis: The Kennish-Vasquez family finally uncovers the depths of Daphne's grief and takes steps to intervene.
episodes.title: Girl on the Cliff

episodes.synopsis: Graduation day has arrived, but Daphne is distracted by the impending hearing over her parole violation.
episodes.title: And Life Begins Right Away

episodes.synopsis: Days before Christmas, Bay and Daphne switch places à la "Freaky Friday" in an alternate reality where the switch never happened
episodes.title: Yuletide Fortune Tellers

episodes.synopsis: With summer over, Daphne elects to attend a local college in order to stay close to Bay, but Emmett goes off to school, leaving them both behind.
episodes.title: And It Cannot Be Changed

episodes.synopsis: Bay and Emmett begin to negotiate the complications of their long-distance romance, and Daphne struggles in her first pre-med class.
episodes.title: Bracing the Waves

episodes.synopsis: Daphne and a dorm mate scheme to gain control of the preferred bathroom, and Bay conceals her felony conviction to get her work into an art show.
episodes.title: I Lock the Door Upon Myself

episodes.synopsis: Daphne is distraught over a poor grade on an exam, Emmett comes for a visit at an inconvenient time, and Bay makes a bad decision.
episodes.title: We Were So Close That Nothing Used to Stand Between Us

episodes.synopsis: Bay wakes up in bed with Tank after a night of drinking and tries to remember what happened. Daphne clashes with Vimla during a chemistry project.
episodes.title: At the First Clear Word

episodes.synopsis: Bay's behavior at a dorm party angers Emmett and sparks a university investigation that could derail the school's deaf program.
episodes.title: Black and Gray

episodes.synopsis: Emmett ignores Bay's attempts to talk about what happened with Tank, and a storm strands Regina and Daphne at the coffeehouse.
episodes.title: Fog and Storm and Rain

episodes.synopsis: Bay tries to get her art career back on track, and Daphne discovers that Mingo's new interest in her carries an ulterior motive.
episodes.title: Art Like Love Is Dedication

episodes.synopsis: Bay tries to distract herself from her troubles with Emmett, and Daphne expands her social horizons by getting involved in sorority rush.
episodes.title: Player's Choice

episodes.synopsis: Bay pays Emmett a surprise visit, but the trip drives a wedge between them. A poor grade undermines Daphne's dream of becoming a doctor.
episodes.title: There Is My Heart
